release.name: Octo-Pie API v2.3.0 Released: Enhanced Auth & Comments
release.body: This release introduces new authentication endpoints, improves error handling, and adds support for comments on posts.

pull_requests.title: Add OAuth2 login endpoint
pull_requests.body: Implemented OAuth2 login flow with JWT tokens for authentication.

pull_requests.title: Improve error handling for /posts
pull_requests.body: Refactored error codes to return 404 instead of 500 for missing posts.

pull_requests.title: Add support for post comments
pull_requests.body: Added GET /comments and POST /comments endpoints for posts.

issues.title: Fix authentication bug on login
issues.body: Resolved issue where incorrect credentials returned a 500 error instead of 401.

issues.title: Add missing validations for comments
issues.body: Ensure comment text is not empty and post ID exists before accepting POST /comments.
